title: 12/16/21 DPS Hour 2 Albert Breer
itunes:title: 12/16/21 DPS Hour 2 Albert Breer
description:
Albert Breer talks to Dan about the Covid protocols in the NFL. Albert says the league will try to get all the games in and wont look to postpone games due to fans in the stands.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
